name: Nightmare on North Sentinal
description:
This is an experiment you can't survive in North Sentinal Island , a first-person psychological horror game developed by Jayandhansurea .   explore  the massive North Sentinal island  and try to survive long enough to discover its terrible secret... if you dare.

Synopsis:

you stuck in most dangerous island in the world inhibited by gang of crazy killers , who killed 1000 of people who lived there , now you saw the every illegal things they were doing , General Ben is king of island , will you kill the , killers and general ben to save innocent people life?

Nightmare on NorthSentinal  is a true psychological horror experience which aims to show that the most terrifying monsters of all come from the human mind.

Important features:

1)frightening AI

2)Inventory system

3)Save system

4)Stealth mechanics

5)interactive shooting mechanics and more
